home.parrafo-info: I am a young man focused on Web Development in general, as a person who loves intuitive and aesthetically pleasing designs I seek to create projects that provide the best experience for the user.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
Besides being a senior student in Software Development, I am also a self-taught person who is constantly learning.

I have experience in the Web Development field. My first website I did for a coffee cooperative called Cafioccidente.

Since my first website. Solo he concentrado mi tiempo en mejorar mis habilidades, no solo aprendiendo nuevas tecnologias, si no tambien, consolidando mis conocimientos previos.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: Informative website for Colombian coffee cooperative. This site was my first project as a web developer, however it is fully functional and responsive.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my most outstanding projects, my technical skills and a bit about my background.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: A fully functional E-commerce. This is my last project, an E-commerce for GlassVision optics, located in Cali-Colombia.
